Name: subset
Description/Notes: Function for indexing a subset of the data object (e.g. dat.subset[])

Name: U
Description/Notes: Horizontal velocity as a complex quantity (dat.u + 1j * dat.v)

Name: U_angle
Description/Notes: "Direction of the horizontal velocity (counter-clockwise from X
column5: or streamwise direction depending on coordinate system)"

Name: tke
Description/Notes: Turbulent kinetic energy (half the sum of the data in `'tke_vec'`)

Name: Ecoh
Description/Notes: Coherent turbulent kinetic energy (root-sum-square of Reynold's stresses)

Name: I
Description/Notes: Turbulence Intensity: ratio of sigma_Uh to horizontal velocity magnitude

Name: Itke
Description/Notes: TKE Intensity: Ratio of sqrt(2*tke) to horizontal velocity magnitude
